mapper.select: SELECT MLD.COMPANY_CD , MLD.DIVISION_CD , MLD.RECEIPT_ID , MLD.SEQ , MLD.STATE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MLD.COMPANY_CD, MLD.DIVISION_CD, 'WM0003', MLD.STATE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS STATE_NM , MLD.IO_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_IO_TYPE_NAME(MLD.COMPANY_CD, MLD.DIVISION_CD, MLD.IO_TYPE) FROM DUAL) AS IO_TYPE_NM , MLD.PARTNER_CD , MP.PARTNER_NM , MLD.LOCATION_CD , ML.LOCATION_NM , MLD.ITEM_ID , MI.ITEM_NM , MI.ITEM_SPEC , MI.ITEM_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MI.COMPANY_CD, MI.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0002', MI.ITEM_TYPE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS ITEM_TYPE_NM , MLD.UNIT , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MLD.COMPANY_CD, MLD.DIVISION_CD, MLD.UNIT) FROM DUAL) AS UNIT_NM , MLD.RECEIPT_QTY , MLD.CURRENCY_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MLD.COMPANY_CD, MLD.DIVISION_CD, 'SM0017', MLD.CURRENCY_CD, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS CURRENCY_NM , MLD.EXCHANGE_RATE , MLD.UNIT_PRICE , MLD.AMOUNT , MLD.LOCAL_AMOUNT , MLD.REFERENCE_NO , MLD.RECEIPT_DETAIL_ID , MLD.RCV_LOGISTIC_UNIT_ID , MLD.DESCRIPTION , MLD.UPDATE_BY AS UPDATE_USER_NO , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_USER_NAME(MLD.COMPANY_CD, MLD.DIVISION_CD, MLD.UPDATE_BY) FROM DUAL ) AS UPDATE_USER_NM , TO_CHAR(MLD.UPDATE_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDATE_DATE , ROWIDTOCHAR(MLD.ROWID) AS KEY_ID FROM MOM_LOCATION_RECEIPT_DTL MLD , MOM_ITEM MI , MOM_LOCATION ML , MOM_PARTNER MP WHERE MLD.COMPANY_CD = MI.COMPANY_CD AND MLD.DIVISION_CD = MI.DIVISION_CD AND MLD.ITEM_ID = MI.ITEM_ID AND MLD.COMPANY_CD = ML.COMPANY_CD(+) AND MLD.DIVISION_CD = ML.DIVISION_CD(+) AND MLD.LOCATION_CD = ML.LOCATION_CD(+) AND MLD.COMPANY_CD = MP.COMPANY_CD(+) AND MLD.DIVISION_CD = MP.DIVISION_CD(+) AND MLD.PARTNER_CD = MP.PARTNER_CD(+) AND MLD.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MLD.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MLD.RECEIPT_ID = #{receiptId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
